reason: Specific question about 정직 vs 휴직 difference. Answer accurately reflects source content from page 128: similarities (신분보유, 직무수행불가, 복귀전제), differences (성격, 기간, 발생, 보수, 경력평정). Core facts match source.
Specific question about 직권면직 사유. Answer accurately lists all 6 grounds from 국가공무원법 제70조 as found on page 128. Definition and distinction from 휴직 also match source.

Duplicate of q_3_0237 (same topic: 휴직 vs 정직). Massive hallucination: salary percentages (공무상 질병 100%, 일반 질병 70%->50%, 유학 50%, 육아 0%), 승진 제한 18개월, 징계 말소 7년, 법령 제73조/제79조 - none of these appear on page 128.
Nonsensical question: '정직과의 구별 기간은 어떻게 계산하나요?' treats section heading as a calculable period. Answer is raw dump of source text with no synthesis.
Nonsensical question: '정직과의 구별은 몇 년까지 가능한가요?' treats section heading as having a year limit. Duplicate answer identical to q_3_0240.
Nonsensical question: '정직과의 구별의 유형' asks for types of a distinction that has no types. Duplicate answer identical to q_3_0240/q_3_0241, raw dump.
Nonsensical question: '정직과의 구별 관련 제한사항' asks about restrictions on a conceptual distinction. Duplicate answer identical to previous entries, raw dump.
Reasonable question asking what 직권면직과의 구별 means. Answer accurately presents 가) 휴직 vs 면직 신분 difference and 나) 직권면직 definition with all 6 grounds from page 128 source.
Duplicate of q_3_0248: same topic (직권면직과의 구별 개념), identical answer content.
Nonsensical question: '직권면직과의 구별에 관한 기간과 횟수' asks about period and frequency of a conceptual distinction. Duplicate answer identical to q_3_0248/q_3_0249.
